title: Reincarnation into the Barrier Master - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adopted Protagonist   Age Progression   Age Regression   Animal Rearing   Appearance Changes   Aristocracy   Artifacts   Beastkin   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Cheats   Clingy Lover   Complex Family Relationships   Cooking   Crafting   Curses   Death of Loved Ones   Demi-Humans   Demon Lord   Dense Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Dragons   Elemental Magic   Fast Learner   Godly Powers   Healers   Jealousy   Kingdoms   Level System   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Maids   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Master-Disciple Relationship   Master-Servant Relationship   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Overpowered Protagonist   Past Plays a Big Role   Polygamy   Power Struggle   R-15   Rebellion   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   S*ave Protagonist   S*aves   Slow Growth at Start   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Sword And Magic   Transmigration   Wars   Weak to Strong   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: Kataoka Naotaro
description: When he opened his eyes, Kubo Tamotsu (34 years old) was reincarnated into the different world. He was reincarnated as a 6 years old boy with a「Barrier Lv1」skill. But his status was a 「Slave」. In order to escape from his harsh circumstances, achieve「Peaceful life」, and be「Surrounded by beauties」, those were his dreams from the previous life, he decided to struggle with all his strength.>
